index.name: go
index.subtitle: Go
index.about: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

books.title: The Little Go Book
books.description: The Little Go Book is a free introduction to Google's Go programming language. It's aimed at developers who might not be quite comfortable with the idea of pointers and static typing. It's longer than the other Little books, but hopefully still captures that little feeling.
books.author: Karl Seguin

books.title: Building web apps with Go
books.description: Learn how to build and deploy web applications with Go.
books.author: Jeremy Saenz

books.title: An Introduction to Programming in Go
books.description: Computer programming is the art, craft and science of writing programs which define how computers operate. This book will teach you how to write computer programs using a programming language designed by Google named Go.
books.author: Caleb Doxsey
